### Ejercicio 1

$$X \sim B\left(5,\frac{1}{6}\right)$$

- $E(X)$ y $VAR(X)$

```{python}
from scipy.stats import binom

n = 5
p = 1/6
m,v = binom.stats(n = n, p = p, moments = 'mv')

print(f"E(X) = {m}")
print(f"VAR(X) = {v}")
```

- $P(1 \le X < 4) = P(1 \le X \le 3) = P(X \le 3) - P(X \le 1)$

```{python}
binom.cdf(3,n,p) - binom.cdf(1,n,p)
```

- $P(X \ge 2) = 1 - P(X < 2) = 1 - P(X \le 1)$

```{python}
1 - binom.cdf(1,n,p)
```

### Ejercicio 2

Sea $X:$ "NÃºmero de USBs defectuosos"

$$X \sim B\left(10,\frac{1}{10}\right)$$

- $P(X = 0)$

```{python}
n = 10
p = 1/10

binom.pmf(0,n,p)
```

- $E(X)$

```{python}
m = binom.stats(n = n, p = p, moments = 'm')

print(f"E(X) = {m}")
```
